name: CAR RACE 2022
description:
A best and biggest game ever made by me. In this game you can race with other players. There are 18 cars available, 30 levels. There are two types of modes Single player and Multiplayer. You can save your progress.

Single player:
                             In this mode, you can play with computer. Drive fast and beat the computer. Beware of polices who blocks the road and uses spikes strips. But once the police caught you, you will be fined with charges. Win races and earn more money and buy more cars, and become the fastest racer.

Multi player:

                           In this mode, you challenge with your friends. win races, use more cars.

Controls:

Up - move forward

Down - break

Right - move right

Left - move left

For multiplayer mode:

Player 1:

Up - move forward

Down - break

Right - move right

Left - move left

Player 2:

w - move forward

s - break

d - move right

a - move left

Works only on PC

System requirements:

Speakers, Windows
